name: Ot
description:
Autumn came and Ot needs to gather the leaves

A 2D grid-based puzzle game with 22 levels

Controls:

    Move: Arrow keys | WASD | HJKL | Controller

    Undo: Z (Keyboard) | B (Controller)

    Reset: R (keyboard) | Y (controller)

    Pause: Escape (keyboard) | Start (controller)

Credits:

This game was made with the LÖVE framework

Assets credit:

https://opengameart.org/content/bird-song-1-second

https://opengameart.org/content/breeze

https://opengameart.org/content/20-rustles-dry-leaves

https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram

All other assets were made by me

Twitter: @Koliao

For Linux follow the instructions inside instructions.txt
